abstract: KB Financial Group chose Goldman Sachs Group and Morgan Stanley to arrange its $2 billion share sale, replacing banks including JPMorgan Chase amid a dispute over fees, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: KB Financial Group chose Goldman Sachs Group and Morgan Stanley to arrange its $2 billion share sale, replacing banks including JPMorgan Chase amid a dispute over fees, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: KB Financial Group chose Goldman Sachs Group and Morgan Stanley to arrange its $2 billion share sale, replacing banks including JPMorgan Chase amid a dispute over fees, five people familiar with the matter said, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: KB Financial Switches Banks for $2 Billion Issue
